#### Gestation v D-Dimer  {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

```{r results_biomarker_gestation_ddimer_elisa, echo = FALSE, cache = FALSE, results = 'markup', warning = FALSE, fig.width = 10, eval = TRUE}
dplyr::filter(dipep, group %in% c('Suspected PE', 'Diagnosed PE')) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = gestation, y = ddimer.elisa, colour = first.st)) +
    geom_point() +
    xlab('Gestation') + ylab('D-Dimer - ELISA (ng/l)') +
    theme_bw() +
    labs(colour = 'Primary Classification')

```
